document_data.name: Padulla
document_data.mainbody:
'''Padulla''' was an Untaken of [[Umberlee]], a member of the Bitch Queen's [[Church of Umberlee|clergy]] under Flood Tide [[Allandra Grey]] of the [[Water Queen's House]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Hands off the drinks. We have enough to fill Grey Harbor, but it's all for the funeral.''|Untaken Padulla}}
document_data.Description: Padulla was a tan-skinned [[human]] woman with red hair and green eyes. Her skin was freckled and a single scar cut through the woman's left cheek. Her red hair was gathered in a severe bun. Her garb was a simple [[jerkin]] and a [[tunic]], as well as a cook's [[apron]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Untaken Padulla was serving in the Water Queen's House's kitchens. After the death of [[Holli Dylford]], a member of the church, Untaken Padulla and Untaken [[Zastreva]] worked on a funeral feast to the served in the drowned [[priestess]]' honor.
